sentence: What did shang tsung say when he stole liu kangs shoes? your sole is mine!
explanation: A sole refers to the bottom part of a shoe. A sole can also mean a single entity, often used to indicate the only one.
first_new_sentence: The sole of my shoe needs to be replaced due to wear and tear.
second_new_sentence: A sole survivor was found after the shipwreck.

sentence: What std did forrest gump catch? nsfw jennytal warts
explanation: Warts can refer to a common skin growth caused by a virus. Warts can also refer to problems or issues that cause distress.
first_new_sentence: The doctor diagnosed the patient with warts on his hands.
second_new_sentence: The new policy introduced several warts that could hinder our progress.
